import React, { Component } from 'react' import get from 'lodash/get' import { formatCurrency } from 'utils' export default class Isr extends Component { render () { const { calculation } = this.props return (

Concepto

Monto

Ingresos

Gravados al 16%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['taxed_incomes_16'], 0) )}

Gravados al 8%

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['taxed_incomes_8'], 0))}

Gravados al 0%

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['taxed_incomes_0'], 0))}

Exentos

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['exempted_incomes'], 0) )}

Total en el periodo

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['total_incomes'], 0))}

Ingresos acumulables

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['accumulated_incomes'], 0) )}

Gastos

Gravados al 16%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['taxed_expenses_16'], 0) )}

Gravados al 8%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['taxed_expenses_8'], 0) )}

Gravados al 0%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['taxed_expenses_0'], 0) )}

Exentos

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['exempted_expenses'], 0) )}

Deduccin de activos

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['assets_deduction'], 0) )}

Total en el periodo

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['total_expenses'], 0))}

Gastos acumulables

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['accumulated_expenses'], 0) )}

Utilidad fiscal

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['fiscal_profit'], 0))}

Prdidas fiscales (ejercicios anteriores)

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['previous_tax_loss'], 0) )}

Base Gravable

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['taxed_base'], 0))}

Lmite inferior

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['lower_limit'], 0))}

Excedente sobre lmite inferior

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['excess_over_lower_limit'], 0) )}

Porcentaje aplicable al lmite inferior

{get(calculation.isr, ['applicable_percentage'], 0)}%

Impuesto marginal

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['marginal_tax'], 0))}

Cuota fija

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['fixed_fee'], 0))}

ISR Determinado

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['given_isr'], 0))}

ISR Retenido

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['withheld_isr'], 0))}

Impuesto a cargo

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['tax_charge'], 0))}

Pagos provisionales realizados

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['provisional_payments'], 0) )}

Impuesto antes de compensaciones

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.isr, ['taxes_before_offsets'], 0) )}

Compensacin

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['applied_offsets'], 0))}

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.isr, ['tax_to_pay'], 0))} Impuestos por pagar

) } }
